# noop

> Function which does [nothing][nop].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var noop = require( '@stdlib/utils/noop' );
```

#### noop()

A `function` which does [nothing][nop].

```javascript
noop();
// ...does nothing.
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- eslint no-undef: "error" -->

```javascript
var noop = require( '@stdlib/utils/noop' );

function foo( next ) {
    // Do something...

    // Then...
    next();
}

foo( noop );
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
